Comments_List: This course taught me to be more proficient in the Indonesian language and broadened my understanding of Indonesian culture more.
Learned lots about indonesia and the culture. Also discussed history and Indonesias colonialization.

The biggest strength of this course is the fun and engaging atmosphere. Also, this class pushes you the right amount to grow in your knowledge of the Indonesian language. I do not see any weaknesses in this course.
Loves how it was flexible to focus on what we were interested in.
Yes, I would. This is a great class that you learn a lot in and don't receive too large of a workload in.
Yes definitely. It was so fun and flexible to what I was excited to learn about
